text:
I feel like Grailed is a great marketplace when you are actually able to list an item. Recently I have found the review process to be very inconsistent, tried to list my LV planes hoodie but was rejected for being "inauthentic". The help or appeal process for listings is daunting to say the least, they advertise 2-3 days for a response but frequently it can be weeks I have heard and sometimes never a response.
